\"@uniswap/v3-core/contracts/interfaces/IUniswapV3Pool.sol\";\nimport {Range} from \"../structs/SArrakisV2.sol\";\n\nlibrary Pool {\n    function validateTickSpacing(address pool_, Range memory range_)\n        public\n        view\n        returns (bool)\n    {\n        int24 spacing = IUniswapV3Pool(pool_).tickSpacing();\n        return\n            range_.lowerTick < range_.upperTick &&\n            range_.lowerTick % spacing == 0 &&\n            range_.upperTick % spacing == 0;\n    }\n}\n","keccak256":"0xfcdd62ddf3caf86cf71933d2c35de9d82db4a5765c46d1575d522fe18c2da78f","license":"MIT"},"contracts/libraries/Position.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\npragma solidity 0.8.13;\n\nimport {\n    IUniswapV3Pool\n} from \"@uniswap/v3-core/contracts/interfaces/IUniswapV3Pool.sol\";\nimport {Range} from \"../structs/SArrakisV2.sol\";\n\nlibrary Position {\n    function getLiquidityByRange(\n        IUniswapV3Pool pool_,\n        address self_,\n        int24 lowerTick_,\n        int24 upperTick_\n    ) public view returns (uint128 liquidity) {\n        (liquidity, , , , ) = pool_.positions(\n            getPositionId(self_, lowerTick_, upperTick_)\n        );\n    }\n\n    function getPositionId(\n        address self_,\n        int24 lowerTick_,\n        int24 upperTick_\n    ) public pure returns (bytes32 positionId) {\n        return keccak256(abi.encodePacked(self_, lowerTick_, upperTick_));\n    }\n\n    function rangeExists(Range[] memory currentRanges_, Range memory range_)\n        public\n        pure\n        returns (bool ok, uint256 index)\n    {\n        for (uint256 i; i < currentRanges_.length; i++) {\n            ok =\n                range_.lowerTick == currentRanges_[i].lowerTick &&\n                range_.upperTick == currentRanges_[i].upperTick &&\n                range_.feeTier == currentRanges_[i].feeTier;\n            if (ok) {\n                index = i;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n    }\n}\n","keccak256":"0x4f8114d779871584e4ecb478336bde26da15c74eaef21c5caaa6044ba29b56cc","license":"MIT"},"contracts/libraries/Underlying.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: BUSL-1.1\npragma solidity 0.8.13;\n\nimport {\n    IUniswapV3Pool\n} from \"@uniswap/v3-core/contracts/interfaces/IUniswapV3Pool.sol\";\nimport {IArrakisV2} from \"../interfaces/IArrakisV2.sol\";\nimport {IERC20} from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol\";\nimport {\n    FullMath,\n    LiquidityAmounts\n} from \"@arrakisfi/v3-lib-0.8/contracts/LiquidityAmounts.sol\";\nimport {SqrtPriceMath} from \"@arrakisfi/v3-lib-0.8/contracts/SqrtPriceMath.sol\";\nimport {TickMath} from \"@arrakisfi/v3-lib-0.8/contracts/TickMath.sol\";\nimport {SafeCast} from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/math/SafeCast.sol\";\nimport {\n    UnderlyingPayload,\n    RangeData,\n    PositionUnderlying,\n    ComputeFeesPayload,\n    GetFeesPayload\n} from \"../structs/SArrakisV2.sol\";\nimport {Position} from \"./Position.sol\";\n\nlibrary Underlying {\n    // solhint-disable-next-line function-max-lines\n    function totalUnderlyingForMint(\n        UnderlyingPayload memory underlyingPayload_,\n        uint256 mintAmount_,\n        uint256 totalSupply_\n    ) public view returns (uint256 amount0, uint256 amount1) {\n        uint256 fee0;\n        uint256 fee1;\n        for (uint256 i; i < underlyingPayload_.ranges.length; i++) {\n            {\n                IUniswapV3Pool pool = IUniswapV3Pool(\n                    underlyingPayload_.factory.getPool(\n                        underlyingPayload_.token0,\n                        underlyingPayload_.token1,\n                        underlyingPayload_.ranges[i].feeTier\n                    )\n                );\n                (\n                    uint256 a0,\n                    uint256 a1,\n                    uint256 f0,\n                    uint256 f1\n                ) = underlyingMint(\n                        RangeData({\n                            self: underlyingPayload_.self,\n                            range: underlyingPayload_.ranges[i],\n                            pool: pool\n                        }),\n                        mintAmount_,\n                        totalSupply_\n                    );\n                amount0 += a0;\n                amount1 += a1;\n                fee0 += f0;\n                fee1 += f1;\n            }\n        }\n\n        IArrakisV2 arrakisV2 = IArrakisV2(underlyingPayload_.self);\n\n        (uint256 fee0After, uint256 fee1After) = subtractAdminFees(\n            fee0,\n            fee1,\n            arrakisV2.managerFeeBPS()\n        );\n\n        amount0 += FullMath.mulDivRoundingUp(\n            mintAmount_,\n            fee0After +\n                IERC20(underlyingPayload_.token0).balanceOf(\n                    underlyingPayload_.self\n                ) -\n                arrakisV2.managerBalance0(),\n            totalSupply_\n        );\n        amount1 += FullMath.mulDivRoundingUp(\n            mintAmount_,\n            fee1After +\n                IERC20(underlyingPayload_.token1).balanceOf(\n                    underlyingPayload_.self\n                ) -\n                arrakisV2.managerBalance1(),\n            totalSupply_\n        );\n    }\n\n    // solhint-disable-next-line function-max-lines\n    function totalUnderlyingWithFees(\n        UnderlyingPayload memory underlyingPayload_\n    )\n        public\n        view\n        returns (\n            uint256 amount0,\n            uint256 amount1,\n            uint256 fee0,\n            uint256 fee1\n        )\n    {\n        return _totalUnderlyingWithFees(underlyingPayload_, 0);\n    }\n\n    function totalUnderlyingAtPriceWithFees(\n        UnderlyingPayload memory underlyingPayload_,\n        uint160 sqrtPriceX96_\n    )\n        public\n        view\n        returns (\n            uint256 amount0,\n            uint256 amount1,\n            uint256 fee0,\n            uint256 fee1\n        )\n    {\n        return _totalUnderlyingWithFees(underlyingPayload_, sqrtPriceX96_);\n    }\n\n    function underlying(RangeData memory underlying_, uint160 sqrtPriceX96_)\n        public\n        view\n        returns (\n            uint256 amount0,\n            uint256 amount1,\n            uint256 fee0,\n            uint256 fee1\n        )\n    {\n        (uint160 sqrtPriceX96, int24 tick, , , , , ) = underlying_.pool.slot0();\n        bytes32 positionId = Position.getPositionId(\n            underlying_.self,\n            underlying_.range.lowerTick,\n            underlying_.range.upperTick\n        );\n        PositionUnderlying memory positionUnderlying = PositionUnderlying({\n            positionId: positionId,\n            sqrtPriceX96: sqrtPriceX96_ > 0 ? sqrtPriceX96_ : sqrtPriceX96,\n            tick: tick,\n            lowerTick: underlying_.range.lowerTick,\n            upperTick: underlying_.range.upperTick,\n            pool: underlying_.pool\n        });\n        (amount0, amount1, fee0, fee1) = getUnderlyingBalances(\n            positionUnderlying\n        );\n    }\n\n    function underlyingMint(\n        RangeData memory underlying_,\n        uint256 mintAmount_,\n        uint256 totalSupply_\n    )\n        public\n        view\n        returns (\n            uint256 amount0,\n            uint256 amount1,\n            uint256 fee0,\n            uint256 fee1\n        )\n    {\n        (uint160 sqrtPriceX96, int24 tick, , , , , ) = underlying_.pool.slot0();\n        bytes32 positionId = Position.getPositionId(\n            underlying_.self,\n            underlying_.range.lowerTick,\n            underlying_.range.upperTick\n        );\n        PositionUnderlying memory positionUnderlying = PositionUnderlying({\n            positionId: positionId,\n            sqrtPriceX96: sqrtPriceX96,\n            tick: tick,\n            lowerTick: underlying_.range.lowerTick,\n            upperTick: underlying_.range.upperTick,\n            pool: underlying_.pool\n        });\n        (amount0, amount1, fee0, fee1) = getUnderlyingBalancesMint(\n            positionUnderlying,\n            mintAmount_,\n            totalSupply_\n        );\n    }\n\n    // solhint-disable-next-line function-max-lines\n    function getUnderlyingBalancesMint(\n        PositionUnderlying memory positionUnderlying_,\n        uint256 mintAmount_,\n        uint256 totalSupply_\n    )\n        public\n        view\n        returns (\n            uint256 amount0Current,\n            uint256 amount1Current,\n            uint256 fee0,\n            uint256 fee1\n        )\n    {\n        uint128 liquidity;\n        {\n            uint256 feeGrowthInside0Last;\n            uint256 feeGrowthInside1Last;\n            uint128 tokensOwed0;\n            uint128 tokensOwed1;\n            (\n                liquidity,\n                feeGrowthInside0Last,\n                feeGrowthInside1Last,\n                tokensOwed0,\n                tokensOwed1\n            ) = positionUnderlying_.pool.positions(\n                positionUnderlying_.positionId\n            );\n\n            // compute current fees earned\n            (fee0, fee1) = _getFeesEarned(\n                GetFeesPayload({\n                    feeGrowthInside0Last: feeGrowthInside0Last,\n                    feeGrowthInside1Last: feeGrowthInside1Last,\n                    pool: positionUnderlying_.pool,\n                    liquidity: liquidity,\n                    tick: positionUnderlying_.tick,\n                    lowerTick: positionUnderlying_.lowerTick,\n                    upperTick: positionUnderlying_.upperTick\n                })\n            );\n\n            fee0 += uint256(tokensOwed0);\n            fee1 += uint256(tokensOwed1);\n        }\n\n        // compute current holdings from liquidity\n        (amount0Current, amount1Current) = getAmountsForDelta(\n            positionUnderlying_.sqrtPriceX96,\n            TickMath.getSqrtRatioAtTick(positionUnderlying_.lowerTick),\n            TickMath.getSqrtRatioAtTick(positionUnderlying_.upperTick),\n            SafeCast.toInt128(\n                SafeCast.toInt256(\n                    FullMath.mulDiv(\n                        uint256(liquidity),\n                        mintAmount_,\n                        totalSupply_\n                    )\n                )\n            )\n        );\n    }\n\n    // solhint-disable-next-line function-max-lines\n    function getUnderlyingBalances(\n        PositionUnderlying memory positionUnderlying_\n    )\n        public\n        view\n        returns (\n            uint256 amount0Current,\n            uint256 amount1Current,\n            uint256 fee0,\n            uint256 fee1\n        )\n    {\n        (\n            uint128 liquidity,\n            uint256 feeGrowthInside0Last,\n            uint256 feeGrowthInside1Last,\n            uint128 tokensOwed0,\n            uint128 tokensOwed1\n        ) = positionUnderlying_.pool.positions(positionUnderlying_.positionId);\n\n        // compute current fees earned\n        (fee0, fee1) = _getFeesEarned(\n            GetFeesPayload({\n                feeGrowthInside0Last: feeGrowthInside0Last,\n                feeGrowthInside1Last: feeGrowthInside1Last,\n                pool: positionUnderlying_.pool,\n                liquidity: liquidity,\n                tick: positionUnderlying_.tick,\n                lowerTick: positionUnderlying_.lowerTick,\n                upperTick: positionUnderlying_.upperTick\n            })\n        );\n\n        // compute current holdings from liquidity\n        (amount0Current, amount1Current) = LiquidityAmounts\n            .getAmountsForLiquidity(\n                positionUnderlying_.sqrtPriceX96,\n                TickMath.getSqrtRatioAtTick(positionUnderlying_.lowerTick),\n                TickMath.getSqrtRatioAtTick(positionUnderlying_.upperTick),\n                liquidity\n            );\n\n        fee0 += uint256(tokensOwed0);\n        fee1 += uint256(tokensOwed1);\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Computes the token0 and token1 value for a given amount of liquidity, the current\n    /// pool prices and the prices at the tick boundaries\n    function getAmountsForDelta(\n        uint160 sqrtRatioX96,\n        uint160 sqrtRatioAX96,\n        uint160 sqrtRatioBX96,\n        int128 liquidity\n    ) public pure returns (uint256 amount0, uint256 amount1) {\n        if (sqrtRatioAX96 > sqrtRatioBX96)\n            (sqrtRatioAX96, sqrtRatioBX96) = (sqrtRatioBX96, sqrtRatioAX96);\n\n        if (sqrtRatioX96 < sqrtRatioAX96) {\n            amount0 = SafeCast.toUint256(\n                SqrtPriceMath.getAmount0Delta(\n                    sqrtRatioAX96,\n                    sqrtRatioBX96,\n                    liquidity\n                )\n            );\n        } else if (sqrtRatioX96 < sqrtRatioBX96) {\n            amount0 = SafeCast.toUint256(\n                SqrtPriceMath.getAmount0Delta(\n                    sqrtRatioX96,\n                    sqrtRatioBX96,\n                    liquidity\n                )\n            );\n            amount1 = SafeCast.toUint256(\n                SqrtPriceMath.getAmount1Delta(\n                    sqrtRatioAX96,\n                    sqrtRatioX96,\n                    liquidity\n                )\n            );\n        } else {\n            amount1 = SafeCast.toUint256(\n                SqrtPriceMath.getAmount1Delta(\n                    sqrtRatioAX96,\n                    sqrtRatioBX96,\n                    liquidity\n                )\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    function subtractAdminFees(\n        uint256 rawFee0_,\n        uint256 rawFee1_,\n        uint16 managerFeeBPS_\n    ) public pure returns (uint256 fee0, uint256 fee1) {\n        fee0 = rawFee0_ - ((rawFee0_ * (managerFeeBPS_)) / 10000);\n        fee1 = rawFee1_ - ((rawFee1_ * (managerFeeBPS_)) / 10000);\n    }\n\n    // solhint-disable-next-line function-max-lines\n    function computeMintAmounts(\n        uint256 current0_,\n        uint256 current1_,\n        uint256 totalSupply_,\n        uint256 amount0Max_,\n        uint256 amount1Max_\n    ) public pure returns (uint256 mintAmount) {\n        // compute proportional amount of tokens to mint\n        if (current0_ == 0 && current1_ > 0) {\n            mintAmount = FullMath.mulDiv(amount1Max_, totalSupply_, current1_);\n        } else if (current1_ == 0 && current0_ > 0) {\n            mintAmount = FullMath.mulDiv(amount0Max_, totalSupply_, current0_);\n        } else if (current0_ > 0 && current1_ > 0) {\n            uint256 amount0Mint = FullMath.mulDiv(\n                amount0Max_,\n                totalSupply_,\n                current0_\n            );\n            uint256 amount1Mint = FullMath.mulDiv(\n                amount1Max_,\n                totalSupply_,\n                current1_\n            );\n            require(\n                amount0Mint > 0 && amount1Mint > 0,\n                \"ArrakisVaultV2: mint 0\"\n            );\n\n            mintAmount = amount0Mint < amount1Mint ? amount0Mint : amount1Mint;\n        } else {\n            revert(\"ArrakisVaultV2: panic\");\n        }\n    }\n\n    // solhint-disable-next-line function-max-lines\n    function _getFeesEarned(GetFeesPayload memory feeInfo_)\n        private\n        view\n        returns (uint256 fee0, uint256 fee1)\n    {\n        (\n            ,\n            ,\n            uint256 feeGrowthOutside0Lower,\n            uint256 feeGrowthOutside1Lower,\n            ,\n            ,\n            ,\n\n        ) = feeInfo_.pool.ticks(feeInfo_.lowerTick);\n        (\n            ,\n            ,\n            uint256 feeGrowthOutside0Upper,\n            uint256 feeGrowthOutside1Upper,\n            ,\n            ,\n            ,\n\n        ) = feeInfo_.pool.ticks(feeInfo_.upperTick);\n\n        ComputeFeesPayload memory payload = ComputeFeesPayload({\n            feeGrowthInsideLast: feeInfo_.feeGrowthInside0Last,\n            feeGrowthOutsideLower: feeGrowthOutside0Lower,\n            feeGrowthOutsideUpper: feeGrowthOutside0Upper,\n            feeGrowthGlobal: feeInfo_.pool.feeGrowthGlobal0X128(),\n            pool: feeInfo_.pool,\n            liquidity: feeInfo_.liquidity,\n            tick: feeInfo_.tick,\n            lowerTick: feeInfo_.lowerTick,\n            upperTick: feeInfo_.upperTick\n        });\n\n        fee0 = _computeFeesEarned(payload);\n        payload.feeGrowthInsideLast = feeInfo_.feeGrowthInside1Last;\n        payload.feeGrowthOutsideLower = feeGrowthOutside1Lower;\n        payload.feeGrowthOutsideUpper = feeGrowthOutside1Upper;\n        payload.feeGrowthGlobal = feeInfo_.pool.feeGrowthGlobal1X128();\n        fee1 = _computeFeesEarned(payload);\n    }\n\n    // solhint-disable-next-line function-max-lines\n    function _totalUnderlyingWithFees(\n        UnderlyingPayload memory underlyingPayload_,\n        uint160 sqrtPriceX96_\n    )\n        private\n        view\n        returns (\n            uint256 amount0,\n            uint256 amount1,\n            uint256 fee0,\n            uint256 fee1\n        )\n    {\n        for (uint256 i; i < underlyingPayload_.ranges.length; i++) {\n            {\n                IUniswapV3Pool pool = IUniswapV3Pool(\n                    underlyingPayload_.factory.getPool(\n                        underlyingPayload_.token0,\n                        underlyingPayload_.token1,\n                        underlyingPayload_.ranges[i].feeTier\n                    )\n                );\n                (uint256 a0, uint256 a1, uint256 f0, uint256 f1) = underlying(\n                    RangeData({\n                        self: underlyingPayload_.self,\n                        range: underlyingPayload_.ranges[i],\n                        pool: pool\n                    }),\n                    sqrtPriceX96_\n                );\n                amount0 += a0;\n                amount1 += a1;\n                fee0 += f0;\n                fee1 += f1;\n            }\n        }\n\n        IArrakisV2 arrakisV2 = IArrakisV2(underlyingPayload_.self);\n\n        (uint256 fee0After, uint256 fee1After) = subtractAdminFees(\n            fee0,\n            fee1,\n            arrakisV2.managerFeeBPS()\n        );\n\n        amount0 +=\n            fee0After +\n            IERC20(underlyingPayload_.token0).balanceOf(\n                underlyingPayload_.self\n            ) -\n            arrakisV2.managerBalance0();\n        amount1 +=\n            fee1After +\n            IERC20(underlyingPayload_.token1).balanceOf(\n                underlyingPayload_.self\n            ) -\n            arrakisV2.managerBalance1();\n    }\n\n    function _computeFeesEarned(ComputeFeesPayload memory computeFees_)\n        private\n        pure\n        returns (uint256 fee)\n    {\n        unchecked {\n            // calculate fee growth below\n            uint256 feeGrowthBelow;\n            if (computeFees_.tick >= computeFees_.lowerTick) {\n                feeGrowthBelow = computeFees_.feeGrowthOutsideLower;\n            } else {\n                feeGrowthBelow =\n                    computeFees_.feeGrowthGlobal -\n                    computeFees_.feeGrowthOutsideLower;\n            }\n\n            // calculate fee growth above\n            uint256 feeGrowthAbove;\n            if (computeFees_.tick < computeFees_.upperTick) {\n                feeGrowthAbove = computeFees_.feeGrowthOutsideUpper;\n            } else {\n                feeGrowthAbove =\n                    computeFees_.feeGrowthGlobal -\n                    computeFees_.feeGrowthOutsideUpper;\n            }\n\n            uint256 feeGrowthInside = computeFees_.feeGrowthGlobal -\n                feeGrowthBelow -\n                feeGrowthAbove;\n            fee = FullMath.mulDiv(\n                computeFees_.liquidity,\n                feeGrowthInside - computeFees_.feeGrowthInsideLast,\n                0x100000000000000000000000000000000\n            );\n        }\n    }\n}\n","keccak256":"0x338ed84f7c5ba69886879876337791dfaae467f0625b8096d52cb03ab1439ca8","license":"BUSL-1.1"},"contracts/structs/SArrakisV2.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\npragma solidity >=0.8.0;\n\nimport {\n    IUniswapV3Pool\n} from \"@uniswap/v3-core/contracts/interfaces/IUniswapV3Pool.sol\";\nimport {\n    IUniswapV3Factory\n} from \"@uniswap/v3-core/contracts/interfaces/IUniswapV3Factory.sol\";\n\nstruct PositionLiquidity {\n    uint128 liquidity;\n    Range range;\n}\n\nstruct SwapPayload {\n    bytes payload;\n    address devdoc.details: DO NOT ADD STATE VARIABLES - APPEND THEM TO ArrakisV2Storage

params.feeTiers_: list of fee tiers associated to pools to whitelist.

approve(address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-approve}. NOTE: If `amount` is the maximum `uint256`, the allowance is not updated on `transferFrom`. This is semantically equivalent to an infinite approval. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address.

params.routers_: list of routers addresses to blacklist.

params.burnAmount_: amount of vault shares to burn.
params.receiver_: address to receive underlying tokens withdrawn.

returns.amount0: amount of token0 sent to receiver
returns.amount1: amount of token1 sent to receiver

decimals().details: Returns the number of decimals used to get its user representation. For example, if `decimals` equals `2`, a balance of `505` tokens should be displayed to a user as `5.05` (`505 / 10 ** 2`). Tokens usually opt for a value of 18, imitating the relationship between Ether and Wei. This is the value {ERC20} uses, unless this function is overridden; NOTE: This information is only used for _display_ purposes: it in no way affects any of the arithmetic of the contract, including {IERC20-balanceOf} and {IERC20-transfer}.

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Atomically decreases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller. This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address. - `spender` must have allowance for the caller of at least `subtractedValue`.

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Atomically increases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller. This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address.

params.mintAmount_: represent the amount of Arrakis V2 shares to mint.
params.receiver_: address that will receive Arrakis V2 shares.

returns.amount0: amount of token0 needed to mint mintAmount_ of shares.
returns.amount1: amount of token1 needed to mint mintAmount_ of shares.

name().details: Returns the name of the token.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

rebalance(((uint128,(int24,int24,uint24).details: only Manager contract can call this function.

params.rebalanceParams_: rebalance params, containing ranges where we need to collect tokens and ranges where we need to mint liquidity. Also contain swap payload to changes token0/token1 proportion.

params.pools_: list of pools to remove from whitelist.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setInits(uint256,uint256).details: only callable by restrictedMint or by owner if restrictedMint is unset.

symbol().details: Returns the symbol of the token, usually a shorter version of the name.

transfer(address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-transfer}. Requirements: - `to` cannot be the zero address. - the caller must have a balance of at least `amount`.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-transferFrom}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. This is not required by the EIP. See the note at the beginning of {ERC20}. NOTE: Does not update the allowance if the current allowance is the maximum `uint256`. Requirements: - `from` and `to` cannot be the zero address. - `from` must have a balance of at least `amount`. - the caller must have allowance for ``from``'s tokens of at least `amount`.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.routers_: list of router addresses to whitelist.
